text: Sredi mnogobozhnikov yest' i takiye, kotoryye prislushivayutsya k tebe, [o Mukhammad], no My nakinuli na ikh serdtsa pokrovy i porazili ikh ushi glukhotoy, chtoby oni ne mogli postignut' Koran. I kakoye by znameniye oni ni uvideli, oni ne uveruyut v nego, tak chto kogda oni prikhodyat k tebe, chtoby prepirat'sya s toboy, to zayavlyayut: "To, [chto govoritsya v Korane], - vsego-navsego skazaniya drevnikh pokoleniy
